articles.title: A 'zombie' volcano in Bolivia has been acting up, and scientists finally know why - Live Science
articles.description: Uturuncu, a dormant volcano in Bolivia, appeared to be getting ready to erupt following earthquakes and "sombrero" shaped deformation — scientists have now worked out what's going on beneath the surface.
